basics.label: Software Engineer/Architect
basics.name: Vikas Chouhan
basics.summary: I have ~12 years of experience in professional software development in embedded & AI/ML domain with my AI skills mostly coming from having worked on a healthcare startup in last 2+ years.

work.summary: Driving engineering R&D for our healthcare startup.
highlights: Successfully developed and deployed an AI system for detecting 50 skin disease conditions with an overall accuracy of >80%. Accessible by our reference app DermaAid.
Enhanced our private image dataset with images available from various public sources on the web. This was open sourced as a Github project.

Read & implemented algorithms in various research papers which were not yet available in standard ML packages. One algorithm OpenMax helped to improve our model's open set diagnostic sensitivity by ~10%.
Ran lots of experiments with visualization algorithms, loss functions, augmentations etc to optimize our AI models, improving our model's performance by ~6-8%.
Contributed to few papers as co-author & submitted in various national & international journals.
Scored in top-5 in ISIC-2019 Skin Lesion Diagnosis Challenge. The model used was a single Densenet-161 instance with several optimizations loosely based off our work at Nurithm Labs.
Winner of Millenium Alliance's COVID19 Innovation Grand Challenge and Grand Challenges Exploration India.

work.summary: Handling technical queries and issues from ARM Licensee partners.
highlights: Resolving technical queries and issues for ARM partners on a dedicated basis, increasing team's efficiency in dealing with issue resolution rate.

work.company: NXP India Pvt Ltd (Formerly Freescale Semiconductor India Pvt Ltd)
work.summary: Software developer and post silicon validation engineer.
highlights: Developed validation tests in C & assembly for hunting various hardware issues in multicore processors, helping our team to catch serious silicon issues in time.

Developed & architected a software tool in C/C++ and Python for writing and generating algorithmic tests for multicore ARM processors. This helped us to port a lot of our PowerPC based tests to ARM based SOCs in a very time constrained window.
Developed proficiency at low level hardware debugging via JTAG/PEX.
Worked a little bit on IOT stacks and video decoding standards (H264, H265 etc.) as part of random small projects.

work.company: NXP India Pvt Ltd (Formerly Freescale Semiconductor India Pvt Ltd)
highlights: Worked on enhancing our internal validation tools & fixing bugs and issues.
Ported them from SunOS to Linux helping our team move from old legacy Sun systems to newer & cheaper Linux systems.
